definition: Xianju county in Taizhou 台州[Tai1 zhou1], Zhejiang
(archaic) sentence-final particle expressing a doubting attitude
to reside/to be (in a certain position)/to store up/to be at a standstill/residence/house/restaurant/classifier for bedrooms

sentences.english: This article mainly illustrated the application of soil erosion estimation method based on Geographic Information System (GIS) and remote sensing (RS) technology.
sentences.chinese: 研究了土壤侵蝕定量遙感方法在浙江省仙居縣的應用。
